name: Ext_R4_ServiceRequest_patientInstruction
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ServiceRequest.patientInstruction for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.patientInstruction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Instructions in terms that are understood by the patient or consumer.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo. `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction`.
